title: Spire Watcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cause a player to enter the Wrath stance. All attacks they deal are upgraded by one attack stage. If this increases their attack from None to Basic, they are able to make an attack instead of using their night ability. Their defence is also set to Vulnerable.
- Cause a player to enter the Calm stance. When they exit Calm, they may make an additional action the following day/night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities resolve after every other night action.
- Players will know what stance they are in.
- You may multitask, but you cannot target the same player with both abilities on the same night.
- You may target yourself.
- When you die, all stances are cleared (Calm is triggered from this).
